message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a mutually beneficial deal. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.
